GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.19.250
GSD.description:
ARM: Fix refcount leak in axxia_boot_secondary

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.250 by commit 71e12e5b02674459a24f16e965255d63b31fe049, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 1d22924e1c4e299337e86e290c02c3e3eb43b608. For more details please see the references link.
